videoGrid.index.searchCommunity:
**Functional Purpose**: Placeholder text for a search input field
**UI Location**: Community → Videos (search bar)
**When Users See This**: When the search input field is empty
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a search input placeholder
**Current English**: "Search community content"
videoGrid.index.learnWithCommunity:
**Functional Purpose**: Heading for the community videos section
**UI Location**: Community → Videos (section header)
**When Users See This**: On viewing the community videos page
**Technical Context**: Standard heading text
**Current English**: "Learn with our community"
videoGrid.index.walkthroughsTutorials:
**Functional Purpose**: Description for the community videos section
**UI Location**: Community → Videos (below section header)
**When Users See This**: On viewing the community videos page
**Technical Context**: Standard descriptive text
**Current English**: "Walkthroughs, tutorials and livestreams from our community."
videoGrid.index.noVideosFound:
**Functional Purpose**: Title indicating that no videos matched the current query
**UI Location**: Community → Videos (fallback message when search yields no results)
**When Users See This**: When a user's search or filter criteria result in no matching videos
**Technical Context**: Part of a FilterFallback component
**Current English**: "No videos found."
videoGrid.index.tryChangingFilters:
**Functional Purpose**: Suggestion to the user when no videos are found for their query
**UI Location**: Community → Videos (fallback message description)
**When Users See This**: When a user's search or filter criteria result in no matching videos
**Technical Context**: Part of a FilterFallback component
**Current English**: "Try changing your filters to find the video you are looking for."
videoGrid.index.thereAreNoVideos:
**Functional Purpose**: Title indicating that there are currently no videos available in the community section
**UI Location**: Community → Videos (fallback message when no videos exist at all)
**When Users See This**: When the community video section is empty (e.g., no videos have been uploaded yet)
**Technical Context**: Part of a FilterFallback component
**Current English**: "There are currently no videos."
videoGrid.index.checkBackLater:
**Functional Purpose**: Suggestion to the user when no videos are currently available
**UI Location**: Community → Videos (fallback message description)
**When Users See This**: When the community video section is empty
**Technical Context**: Part of a FilterFallback component
**Current English**: "Check back here later for more!"
